items.question: Can I change my billing mode?
items.answer: Yes, you can switch between billing modes at any time. The change will take effect at the next billing cycle.

items.question: How does hourly billing work?
items.answer: Hourly billing counts every second of use. You're billed monthly for actual usage time, with precise details in your dashboard.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees?
items.answer: Absolutely none. All our prices are transparent and include infrastructure, bandwidth and support. Only additional options are charged extra.

items.question: What happens if I exceed my quota?
items.answer: For plans with quotas, you're notified at 80% and 100% usage. You can then upgrade your plan or enable pay-as-you-go billing for the excess.

items.question: Does QuickFund financing affect my credit?
items.answer: QuickFund performs a soft check that doesn't impact your credit score. Only final acceptance may generate a standard credit inquiry.
